purpose: Provide a welcoming, secure, and efficient login experience that gets users to their role-specific dashboards quickly while maintaining brand identity and trust

current_problems: Generic centered card with no visual personality or brand identity
No illustration or visual storytelling - feels sterile and corporate
Test user credentials hardcoded and visible in production UI
No visual indication of what happens after successful login
Missing trust signals (secure login badge, encrypted connection, etc.)
No role indication or multi-role login support
No welcome-back personalization or contextual messaging
Link to register uses old 'responsavel' terminology instead of 'user'
ux_flaws: Users don't know which role they're logging in as
No feedback on email format until form submission
Password visibility toggle is small and hard to tap on mobile
No indication of loading state destination (which dashboard?)
Error messages are generic and don't guide users toward solutions
No session timeout warning or security information
Register link uses unclear terminology ('Cadastre-se' without context)
No social login options (Google, Facebook) for faster access
Form autofill may not work optimally due to generic field names
ui_inconsistencies: Plain card with no brand colors or visual interest
No illustration to match Landing and Register pages
Typography doesn't establish hierarchy or importance
Test credentials box uses muted background (looks like disabled content)
No visual separation between form and supplementary content
Button uses gradient but card doesn't reflect brand palette
No loading state beyond spinner in button

design_strategy.visual_identity: Split-screen design on desktop: Left side with large flat illustration + brand messaging, Right side with clean login form. Use purple (#5B21B6) for brand presence, coral (#FB7185) for CTAs, cream (#FFF7ED) for illustration background. Warm, welcoming, professional academic vibe.
design_strategy.layout_approach: Desktop: 50/50 split (illustration | form). Mobile: Stacked vertical (illustration → form). Form stays simple with only email + password + remember me. Add forgot password link. Remove test credentials from production. Add role indicator badges after successful login.
design_strategy.component_hierarchy: Illustration with welcome message → Login card (email, password, remember me, submit) → Secondary actions (forgot password, register link) → Trust badges at bottom
design_strategy.security_messaging: Subtle security indicators: padlock icon, 'Secure login' badge, HTTPS indicator. Makes users feel safe without being heavy-handed.
design_strategy.illustration_strategy: 1 custom flat illustration showing a person accessing a laptop with TutorUP interface on screen. Floating elements: book icons, checkmarks, lock/shield for security. Warm, academic, professional tone.
design_strategy.mobile_differences: Vertical stack layout. Illustration at top (reduced size). Form takes full width. Larger touch targets (min 48px). Native keyboard handling. Sticky login button at bottom on scroll.

form_validation.strategy: Real-time validation on blur for each field
form_validation.email_validation: Check format immediately, show checkmark if valid
form_validation.password_validation: Min 6 characters, show error if less
form_validation.error_display: Below field, coral color, with error icon, 12px font
form_validation.success_indicator: Green checkmark icon on right side of input (optional)

generic_errors.message: Email ou senha incorretos. Verifique e tente novamente.
Não foi possível conectar. Verifique sua internet e tente novamente.
Sua conta foi temporariamente bloqueada. Entre em contato com o suporte.

forgot_password_flow.modal_or_page: Modal overlay preferred for desktop, full-page for mobile

structure: Overlay: Dark background with 50% opacity, backdrop-blur
Modal card: White bg, rounded-16px, max-width-480px, center, p-32px, shadow-2xl
Close button: Top-right corner (X icon, 40px tap target)
Icon: Key or lock icon (coral, 64px, center, mb-16px)
Subtitle: 'Digite seu email e enviaremos instruções para redefinir sua senha' (14px, gray-600, center, mb-24px)
Submit button: 'Enviar link de recuperação' (full-width, 48px, purple bg, rounded-8px)
Back link: 'Voltar para login' (14px, center, coral color, mt-16px)

success_state.message: Email enviado! Verifique sua caixa de entrada e siga as instruções.
success_state.auto_close: Modal auto-closes after 3 seconds or user clicks 'Fechar'

remember_me_functionality.behavior: Saves email in localStorage, not password (security)
remember_me_functionality.auto_fill: On page load, check localStorage and pre-fill email if exists
remember_me_functionality.clear_on_logout: Remove from localStorage when user logs out

loading_states.overlay: Optional: Full-screen semi-transparent overlay during login API call
loading_states.success_transition: Toast message 'Login realizado!' + 200ms delay before navigation
loading_states.error_transition: Shake animation on form + error toast

role_based_redirect.logic: After successful login, redirect based on user role:
role_based_redirect.fallback: If role is unknown, redirect to /app and let RouteGuard handle it

accessibility.focus_visible: 2px purple-600 outline on all interactive elements
accessibility.aria_labels: Checkbox has aria-label='Lembrar de mim', Eye toggle has aria-label='Mostrar senha'
accessibility.keyboard_navigation: Tab order: Email → Password → Remember Me → Forgot Password → Submit → Register
accessibility.screen_reader: Form has proper labels, error messages announced on validation fail
accessibility.focus_trap: Forgot password modal traps focus when open

interactions.input_focus: Border color to purple, ring glow
interactions.forgot_password_modal: Fade in background + slide up modal (200ms)

security_considerations.rate_limiting: Backend should limit login attempts (5 per minute)
security_considerations.logout_all_devices: Future feature: Allow user to logout from all sessions

notes_for_dev: Split screen layout uses CSS Grid with 1:1 columns on desktop, single column on mobile
Left panel (illustration) should be fixed height (100vh) to avoid scrolling
Use React Hook Form with Zod validation (schema already exists)
Implement forgot password modal with React portal or Radix Dialog component
Remember me functionality: Save email to localStorage with key 'tutorup_remember_email'
On component mount, check localStorage and pre-fill email if 'remember me' was checked
Test credentials box should only render if process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development'
Use framer-motion for modal animations (fade in overlay, slide up content)
Form shake animation on error: Use CSS keyframes or framer-motion
Success toast appears using existing useToast hook before navigation
Redirect logic already exists (from location state), maintain current behavior
Mobile: Use position:sticky for submit button when keyboard is visible (optional enhancement)
Illustration should be SVG with proper alt text: 'Person accessing TutorUP dashboard on laptop'
Trust indicators can use lucide-react icons: Lock, Shield, CheckCircle
Forgot password modal should have escape key handler to close
Focus should trap inside modal when open (use Radix Dialog's focus management)
Email input should have autocomplete='email' for better autofill
Password input should have autocomplete='current-password'
Form should have autocomplete='on' to allow browser password managers to work
Loading state should disable all form inputs, not just submit button
performance_considerations: Preload font files for faster text rendering
Use CSS containment for left/right panels
Minimize layout shift by reserving space for illustrations
Target page weight: <200KB on initial load
future_enhancements: Biometric authentication on mobile (fingerprint, Face ID)
Two-factor authentication (2FA) with SMS or authenticator app
Login activity log (recent logins, devices, locations)
Dark mode support with system preference detection
